channel.title: Rank privileges/ donator
channel.description:
Ok, I want to create my own rank.
for example;
mod = 1 admin = 2 owner = 3 hidden = 4 root admin = 20
I want to create my own rank - for example - 6
So if i did rights = 6 it would give them their own rank.
This works - however since its higher than 3, it has admin privileges.
How do i make it so a rank doesn't have those privileges.
I also tried making a rank -1.
it worked - other than the fact that this time even regular players could do the command for that rank.

item.title: Rank privileges/ donator
item.dc:creator: @adamhelloman8 adamhelloman8
item.description:
@adamhelloman8 wrote:

Lol i know. i just can’t figure how to make a normal donator.

Read full topic

it worked - other than the fact that this time even regular players could do the command for that rank.
